title: ANIMAL ABUSE IN LONDON BY CHINESE STUDENTS
-
message:
// Animal abuse in LONDON //
Gonna make this short and straightforward.
This kitten was temporarily looked after by the two international student from China. These demons insisted to look after the kitten as they were friends with the owner.
However, this kitten passed away due to animal abuse by the couple. Ridiculous, right?
Here are some details of what exactly happened to this kitten and some screenshots as evidences.
From what I know, the guy (Chinese name: 蔡胤栋, Anthony Cai) does Fine Art at UAL (University of the Arts London) and the other student (Agnes Zhang) does Philosophy in KCL (King’s College London). There are more personal details of the two on Weibo rn that I probably can’t put it up as there is a chance that this post may not be approved.
The owner has informed the police about this matter, not expecting much from the police really and this is why I’d like to share this here. I know some of you may not think this is the right place for me to post or even felt uncomfortable from the photos below. Sounds stupid, but this is because I want justice for this poor kitten who left this cruel world in pain.
We are considering to draft letters to let both universities know about the matter. We didn’t let these demons to come into the country to abuse animals like this and blaming everything to drugs.
This matter has been shared on Weibo right now with the hashtag #伦敦虐猫# #伦敦两留学生吸毒虐死猫并企图逃回国#. From the information on Weibo, Anthony Cai is planning to escape back to China on the 15th of March. Once they are in China, it’s gonna be **A LOT** harder to find them and arrest them. We gotta share this around and let people know so that hopefully they can be arrested for animal abuse and doing drugs before leaving the UK. UK police and customs really need to stop these evils from escaping and let them know they are not gonna get away with what they have done.
Anyone who know them please provide any information so that the police can find them ASAP.
Clear evidences are shown, karma is on its way.
We really hope to see these demons pay for the things that they have done and may this kitten rest in peace.
-
Please public the information above to the public more more attention on animal abuse and this specific case. Feel free to contact for more information.

title: ANIMAL ABUSE IN LONDON BY CHINESE STUDENTS
-
message:
// Animal abuse in LONDON //
Gonna make this short and straightforward.
This kitten was temporarily looked after by the two international student from China. These demons insisted to look after the kitten as they were friends with the owner.
However, this kitten passed away due to animal abuse by the couple. Ridiculous, right?
Here are some details of what exactly happened to this kitten and some screenshots as evidences.
From what I know, the guy (Chinese name: 蔡胤栋, Anthony Cai) does Fine Art at UAL (University of the Arts London) and the other student (Agnes Zhang) does Philosophy in KCL (King’s College London). There are more personal details of the two on Weibo rn that I probably can’t put it up as there is a chance that this post may not be approved.
The owner has informed the police about this matter, not expecting much from the police really and this is why I’d like to share this here. I know some of you may not think this is the right place for me to post or even felt uncomfortable from the photos below. Sounds stupid, but this is because I want justice for this poor kitten who left this cruel world in pain.
We are considering to draft letters to let both universities know about the matter. We didn’t let these demons to come into the country to abuse animals like this and blaming everything to drugs.
This matter has been shared on Weibo right now with the hashtag #伦敦虐猫# #伦敦两留学生吸毒虐死猫并企图逃回国#. From the information on Weibo, Anthony Cai is planning to escape back to China on the 15th of March. Once they are in China, it’s gonna be **A LOT** harder to find them and arrest them. We gotta share this around and let people know so that hopefully they can be arrested for animal abuse and doing drugs before leaving the UK. UK police and customs really need to stop these evils from escaping and let them know they are not gonna get away with what they have done.
Anyone who know them please provide any information so that the police can find them ASAP.
Clear evidences are shown, karma is on its way.
We really hope to see these demons pay for the things that they have done and may this kitten rest in peace.
-
Please public the information above to the public more more attention on animal abuse and this specific case. Feel free to contact for more information.
